items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

items.content_html: Vista is a lightweight front-end framework designed to simplify UI development while offering the flexibility to handle complex use cases. Built with the MVC (Model-View-Controller) pattern, Vista empowers developers to create clean, intuitive, and highly customizable user interfaces with ease.
items.title: leonghia/vista: Vista is a lightweight front-end framework designed to simplify UI development while offering the flexibility to handle complex use cases. Built with the MVC (Model-View-Controller) pattern, Vista empowers developers to create clean, intuitive, and highly customizable user interfaces with ease.

items.content_html: A Telegram Mini App with a growing collection of tools like calculators, converters, and more. All tools are created using advanced Large Language Models (LLMs), ensuring smart and efficient functionality. Lightweight, user-friendly, and regularly updated to simplify everyday tasks directly within Telegram.

All tools are created using advanced Large Language Models (LLMs), ensuring smart and efficient functionality. Lightweight, user-friendly, and regularly updated to simplify everyday tasks directly within Telegram.
